_a-0000ec0f-47ad-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_EXT_ENUM_RUN_STATUSES
_a-0000ec0f-47ad-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
{
  a!map(
    statusCode: cons!CMGT_EXT_PROCESS_STATUS_INPROGRESS,
    statusName: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:bfb86f42-4888-491d-abaa-e91af09999eb",
    iconColor: ri!brandingMap.InfoAccentColor,
    icon: "spinner"
  ),
  a!map(
    statusCode: cons!CMGT_EXT_PROCESS_STATUS_COMPLETED,
    statusName: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:b9c705fd-4306-4feb-9d14-96140af8debf",
    iconColor: ri!brandingMap.PositiveAccentColor,
    icon: "check-circle"
  ),
  a!map(
    statusCode: cons!CMGT_EXT_PROCESS_STATUS_FAILED,
    statusName: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:7bf3f39b-3e69-4350-bc7f-80293766ffdd",
    iconColor: ri!brandingMap.NegativeAccentColor,
    icon: "times-circle"
  )
}

_a-0000ec18-c90d-8000-9baa-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_EXT_DATA_CurrentDemoDataInfoBanner
_a-0000ec18-c90d-8000-9baa-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
{
  a!map(
    statusCode: cons!CMGT_EXT_PROCESS_STATUS_INPROGRESS,
    primaryText: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:e44fe85a-861f-4799-bd2f-a9c4e3a3402c"(
      #"urn:appian:translation-variable:v1:ad883121-35ab-4a2a-bcd8-f5a5f778e948": a!match(
        value: ri!actionCode,
        equals: cons!CMGT_EXT_PROCESS_ACTION_LOAD,
        then: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:c8b2f25a-eb46-494b-8fa2-ce2d9c5878f3",
        equals: cons!CMGT_EXT_PROCESS_ACTION_CLEAR,
        then: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:99aaca50-69e8-4f8f-be30-6107b842ee29",
        equals: cons!CMGT_EXT_PROCESS_ACTION_RESET,
        then: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:afa9ea4a-e62d-477a-9353-6746411501d3",
        default: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:c8b2f25a-eb46-494b-8fa2-ce2d9c5878f3"
      )
    ),
    secondaryText: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:3d988c65-a3e7-4691-9c72-f70f3187468a",
    icon: "spinner",
    iconColor: ri!brandingMap.InfoAccentColor
  ),
  a!map(
    statusCode: cons!CMGT_EXT_PROCESS_STATUS_COMPLETED,
    primaryText: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:ce22fe43-202c-4902-b951-98a719b892f0"(
      #"urn:appian:translation-variable:v1:f61164cc-8fbd-49db-b9de-81cf3d338202": a!match(
        value: ri!actionCode,
        equals: cons!CMGT_EXT_PROCESS_ACTION_LOAD,
        then: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:473bd13f-c0f0-4d94-ab18-4f5ac3ebcf22",
        equals: cons!CMGT_EXT_PROCESS_ACTION_CLEAR,
        then: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:f2c6101b-d158-4527-a365-1b49434fb148",
        equals: cons!CMGT_EXT_PROCESS_ACTION_RESET,
        then: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:f03ed0a6-5751-4a15-8fb6-231e922cf8d3",
        default: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:473bd13f-c0f0-4d94-ab18-4f5ac3ebcf22"
      )
    ),
    secondaryText: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:e2e3e311-e7fd-4f49-ac77-fed9aa48d588"(
      #"urn:appian:translation-variable:v1:2b9d5cab-7384-41fd-9afc-5d039bab673d": a!match(
        value: ri!actionCode,
        equals: cons!CMGT_EXT_PROCESS_ACTION_LOAD,
        then: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:9ffa2d86-056d-4974-8c27-67e1888d9e79",
        equals: cons!CMGT_EXT_PROCESS_ACTION_CLEAR,
        then: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:9bc54f59-6920-4fb3-ba45-899dc437fca4",
        equals: cons!CMGT_EXT_PROCESS_ACTION_RESET,
        then: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:25fdc4d0-e6c4-44f1-9a50-28fa73bda3cb",
        default: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:9ffa2d86-056d-4974-8c27-67e1888d9e79"
      )
    ),
    icon: "check-circle",
    iconColor: ri!brandingMap.PositiveAccentColor
  ),
  a!map(
    statusCode: cons!CMGT_EXT_PROCESS_STATUS_FAILED,
    primaryText: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:e01aad82-35eb-4368-a426-41f108d53797"(
      #"urn:appian:translation-variable:v1:207af3d2-3af6-4948-90a6-69c80c9a33f8": a!match(
        value: ri!actionCode,
        equals: cons!CMGT_EXT_PROCESS_ACTION_LOAD,
        then: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:8f451293-9d3e-42c6-9504-3794b2f222d6",
        equals: cons!CMGT_EXT_PROCESS_ACTION_CLEAR,
        then: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:eb02e621-9200-494e-97b7-6388215b3f26",
        equals: cons!CMGT_EXT_PROCESS_ACTION_RESET,
        then: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:63f45a36-821c-4b24-8d62-dfe736a958e7",
        default: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:8f451293-9d3e-42c6-9504-3794b2f222d6"
      )
    ),
    secondaryText: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:d17d097e-ef27-4f68-b82a-2ff4f4d507a2",
    icon: "times-circle",
    iconColor: ri!brandingMap.NegativeAccentColor
  )
}

_a-0000ec2b-3df4-8000-9bae-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_EXT_GetActionVisibilityBasedOnLatestRun
_a-0000ec2b-3df4-8000-9bae-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!match(
  value: ri!processExecutionAudit[recordType!CMGT_EXT_ProcessExecutionAudit.statusCode],
  equals: cons!CMGT_EXT_PROCESS_STATUS_INPROGRESS,
  then: a!map(load: false, reset: false, clear: false, retry: false),
  equals: cons!CMGT_EXT_PROCESS_STATUS_COMPLETED,
  then: if(
    contains(
      {
        cons!CMGT_EXT_PROCESS_ACTION_LOAD,
        cons!CMGT_EXT_PROCESS_ACTION_RESET
      },
      ri!processExecutionAudit[recordType!CMGT_EXT_ProcessExecutionAudit.actionCode]
    ),
    a!map(load: false, reset: true, clear: true, retry: false),
    a!map(load: true, reset: false, clear: false, retry:false)
  ),
  equals: cons!CMGT_EXT_PROCESS_STATUS_FAILED,
  then: a!map(load: true, reset: true, clear: true, retry: true),
  default: null
)

_a-0000ec18-c90d-8000-9baa-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_EXT_Sub_CurrentDemoData

_a-0000ec0f-47ad-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_EXT_UTIL_ReturnActionFieldReferenceByActionCode
_a-0000ec0f-47ad-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
cast(
  typeof(a!map()),
  rule!CMGT_UTIL_Filter(
    records: rule!CMGT_EXT_ENUM_RUN_ACTIONS(),
    field: "actionCode",
    value: ri!actionCode
  )
)

_a-0000ec0f-47ad-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_EXT_QR_GetProcessExecutionAudit
_a-0000ec0f-47ad-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!CMGT_UTIL_QueryRecord(
  recordType: recordType!CMGT_EXT_ProcessExecutionAudit,
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  logicalExpressions: ri!additionalLogicalExpressions,
  executeWhen: a!defaultValue(ri!executeWhen, true),
  filters: {
    ri!additionalFilters,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!CMGT_EXT_ProcessExecutionAudit.processId,
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!processId
    )
  },
  fields: ri!fields,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  sort: ri!sort,
  relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData,
  groupByFields: ri!groupByFields,
  searchTerm: ri!searchTerm,
  searchFields: ri!searchFields
)

_a-0000ec18-c90d-8000-9baa-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_EXT_Sub_DemoData_EmptyState

_a-0000ec34-7771-8000-9bb0-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_EXT_RA_loadDemoData

_a-0000e9ca-3659-8000-9bb8-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_UTIL_GetSiteUrl
_a-0000e9ca-3659-8000-9bb8-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!authedPath: cast(
    'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text',
    extract(linktodocument(0, "doc"), """", "/doc/")
  ),
  local!subdomainWithDomain: extract(local!authedPath, "//", "/suite")[1],
  local!subdomain: split(local!subdomainWithDomain, ".")[1],
  a!map(
    subdomain: local!subdomain,
    authedPath: local!authedPath,
    subdomainWithDomain: local!subdomainWithDomain
  )
)

_a-0000ec06-54a3-8000-9cca-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_EXT_DATA_CaseType
_a-0000ec06-54a3-8000-9cca-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!workflowMilestoneColorScheme: rule!CMGT_UTIL_LoadBrandingMap().WorkflowMilestoneColorScheme,
  local!milestoneColors: split(local!workflowMilestoneColorScheme, ","),
  local!residentialPermitCaseTypes: recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseType(
    recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseType.name: "Residential Permit (DEMO)",
    recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseType.uuid: cons!CMGT_EXT_TXT_GENERATED_CASE_CATEGORY_UUIDS[1],
    recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseType.description: "This case type focuses on managing and processing permit applications and approvals specifically related to residential properties, such as home construction, renovations, or additions.",
    recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseType.icon: "home",
    recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseType.isCategory: true,
    recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseType.subCaseTypes: {
      recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseType(
        recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseType.name: "Solar Permit (DEMO)",
        recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseType.uuid: cons!CMGT_EXT_TXT_GENERATED_CASE_TYPE_UUIDS[1],
        recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseType.description: "This case type focuses on managing and processing permit applications and approvals specifically related to solar energy installations, such as solar panel systems.",
        recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseType.caseTypeMetadata:{
         recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseTypeMetadata( recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseTypeMetadata.prefix: "SOP"),
        },
        recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseType.icon: "solar-panel",
        recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseType.isCategory: false,
        recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseType.referenceMilestone: {
          recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone(
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.label: "Intake Review",
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.milestoneColor: local!milestoneColors[1],
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.milestoneUuid: "ae683d8a-d40b-4ffb-af52-2e1625eaf1df"
          ),
          recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone(
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.label: "SME Review",
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.milestoneColor: local!milestoneColors[2],
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.milestoneUuid: "696a4671-dad2-4670-be66-139e7c9096a0"
          ),
          recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone(
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.label: "Payment",
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.milestoneColor: local!milestoneColors[3],
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.milestoneUuid: "f774123a-2419-4a11-82ec-845ebeed018f"
          ),
          recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone(
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.label: "Permit Issuance",
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.milestoneColor: local!milestoneColors[4],
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.milestoneUuid: "16d93461-e7c7-454c-89fa-751825db4c10"
          ),
          recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone(
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.label: "Inspections",
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.milestoneColor: local!milestoneColors[5],
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.milestoneUuid: "fd4aa234-a3b7-4d4f-8c8f-f67699088ead"
          ),
          recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone(
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.label: "Closure",
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.milestoneColor: local!milestoneColors[6],
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.milestoneUuid: "5e11c3ef-5933-446a-8a9b-a6755e549f79"
          )
        }
      ),
      recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseType(
        recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseType.name: "Addition Permit (DEMO)",
        recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseType.uuid: cons!CMGT_EXT_TXT_GENERATED_CASE_TYPE_UUIDS[2],
        recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseType.description: "This case type focuses on making significant changes to an existing structure, such as adding rooms or remodeling kitchens,bathrooms or parking",
        recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseType.caseTypeMetadata:{
          recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseTypeMetadata( recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseTypeMetadata.prefix: "ADN"),
        },
        recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseType.icon: "tools",
        recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseType.isCategory: false,
        recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseType.referenceMilestone: {
          recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone(
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.label: "Intake Review",
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.milestoneColor: local!milestoneColors[1],
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.milestoneUuid: "1c802cdc-82f4-4e19-8de2-7e5ad1d03709"
          ),
          recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone(
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.label: "SME Review",
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.milestoneColor: local!milestoneColors[2],
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.milestoneUuid: "8057798f-3829-4d45-8161-893b44416640"
          ),
          recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone(
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.label: "Payment",
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.milestoneColor: local!milestoneColors[3],
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.milestoneUuid: "ed1c1d99-696f-495a-8fa2-b2c0327e1b74"
          ),
          recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone(
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.label: "Permit Issuance",
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.milestoneColor: local!milestoneColors[4],
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.milestoneUuid: "fc38dd97-fd07-422d-9aeb-74bb6bcc4810"
          ),
          recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone(
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.label: "Inspections",
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.milestoneColor: local!milestoneColors[5],
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.milestoneUuid: "6190fc30-c37a-4d7e-852d-474ff9133a4e"
          ),
          recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone(
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.label: "Closure",
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.milestoneColor: local!milestoneColors[6],
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.milestoneUuid: "5fe83e17-88ce-4ab2-b227-cfc15b6e0e05"
          )
        }
      )
    }
  ),
  local!fraudulentTransactionsCaseType: recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseType(
    recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseType.name: "Fraudulent Transactions (DEMO)",
    recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseType.uuid: cons!CMGT_EXT_TXT_GENERATED_CASE_CATEGORY_UUIDS[2],
    recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseType.description: "This case type focusses on any unauthorised or illegal activity involving the use of payment systems typically for the purpose of obtaining money, goods, or services without proper consent or authorisation from the account holder.",
    recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseType.icon: "credit-card",
    recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseType.isCategory: true,
    recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseType.subCaseTypes: {
      recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseType(
        recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseType.name: "Credit Card Disputes (DEMO)",
        recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseType.uuid: cons!CMGT_EXT_TXT_GENERATED_CASE_TYPE_UUIDS[3],
        recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseType.description: "Credit card disputes are initiated by cardholders when they identify unauthorized charges, billing errors, or dissatisfaction with goods or services.",
        recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseType.caseTypeMetadata:{
          recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseTypeMetadata( recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseTypeMetadata.prefix: "CCD"),
        },
        recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseType.icon: "credit-card-solid",
        recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseType.isCategory: false,
        recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseType.referenceMilestone: {
          recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone(
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.label: "Intake Review",
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.milestoneColor: local!milestoneColors[1],
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.milestoneUuid: "6937ea73-3b8a-494b-b4ef-18a45c1862a9"
          ),
          recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone(
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.label: "Issuer Processing",
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.milestoneColor: local!milestoneColors[2],
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.milestoneUuid: "a47edc1d-4fa6-42cf-a982-6f48ce021468"
          ),
          recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone(
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.label: "Issuer Decision",
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.milestoneColor: local!milestoneColors[3],
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.milestoneUuid: "5fa6419f-5c32-42b7-8070-3dd91cab4c04"
          ),
          recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone(
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.label: "Arbitrator Processing",
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.milestoneColor: local!milestoneColors[4],
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.milestoneUuid: "18ccc205-a25d-43e5-ab56-6db782383cf9"
          ),
          recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone(
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.label: "Arbitrator Decision",
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.milestoneColor: local!milestoneColors[5],
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.milestoneUuid: "017dab9b-a60b-4377-a011-3b85fc36fe01"
          ),
          recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone(
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.label: "Closure",
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.milestoneColor: local!milestoneColors[6],
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.milestoneUuid: "2aeb984b-b036-4297-9a5b-2b1e7cf7591b"
          )
        }
      ),
      recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseType(
        recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseType.name: "Automated Clearing House (DEMO)",
        recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseType.uuid: cons!CMGT_EXT_TXT_GENERATED_CASE_TYPE_UUIDS[4],
        recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseType.description: "Automated Clearing House refers to the disputes that can arise with ACH transactions. ACH transactions are electronic payments made through the ACH network, used for direct deposits, bill payments, and other financial transfers.",
        recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseType.caseTypeMetadata:{
          recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseTypeMetadata( recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseTypeMetadata.prefix: "ACH"),
        },
        recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseType.icon: "money",
        recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseType.isCategory: false,
        recordType!CMGT_CFG_CaseType.referenceMilestone: {
          recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone(
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.label: "Intake Review",
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.milestoneColor: local!milestoneColors[1],
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.milestoneUuid: "eea5c551-839c-43ea-960c-50e537dbf430"
          ),
          recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone(
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.label: "ACH Processing",
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.milestoneColor: local!milestoneColors[2],
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.milestoneUuid: "a481b76a-2775-431f-bbdf-021fae8c8307"
          ),
          recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone(
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.label: "ACH Decision",
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.milestoneColor: local!milestoneColors[3],
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.milestoneUuid: "0aa4d105-062f-425a-b337-f0934a90b13a"
          ),
          recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone(
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.label: "Closure",
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.milestoneColor: local!milestoneColors[6],
            recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_ReferenceMilestone.milestoneUuid: "c5500af9-49cc-4b38-8ef8-159a014f5aac"
          )
        }
      )
    }
  ),
  a!match(
    value: ri!datasetUuids,
    equals: cons!CMGT_EXT_TXT_GENERATED_CASE_CATEGORY_UUIDS[1],
    then: local!residentialPermitCaseTypes,
    equals:cons!CMGT_EXT_TXT_GENERATED_CASE_CATEGORY_UUIDS[2],
    then: local!fraudulentTransactionsCaseType,
    default: {
      local!fraudulentTransactionsCaseType,
      local!residentialPermitCaseTypes
    }
  )
)

_a-0000ec34-7771-8000-9bb0-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_EXT_ENUM_DATASET
_a-0000ec34-7771-8000-9bb0-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*
The data rules for each type are mapped and retrieved with the dataset name where necessary.Here we are having the rule names without () and will be adding '()' in the rules where these rules are used
    datasetName --> The constant containing the name of the dataset
    caseRule-->The name of the rule containing the cases data for the dataset type
    studioFieldsRule -->The name of the rule containing the studio fields data for the dataset type
    referenceTaskRule --> The name of the rule containing the reference tasks data for the dataset type
    taskBlockRule --> The name of the rule containing the task block rule for the dataset type
    caseTypeWorkflowRule --> The name of the rule containing the case type workflow rule for the dataset type
    documentRule --> The name of the rule containing the document rule for the dataset type
    commentRule --> The name of the rule containing the comment rule for the dataset type
    taskUpdateRule -->The name of the rule containing the task status update rule for the dataset type
    deployments --> The respective dataset deployments needs to be passed in the below structure
        a!map(
            onInitialLoad: a!map(
                              packageZip --> The package to be deployed only on initial deployment ,
                              scripts--> The scriptsto be deployed only on initial deployment
                              icfFile--> The ICF file to be deployed only on initial deployment
                              ),
            onEachLoad: a!map(
                              packageZip --> The package to be deployed on each load except the initial load ,
                              scripts--> The scripts to be deployed on each load except the initial load 
                              icfFile--> The ICF file to be deployed on each load except the initial load 
                              ),
    )              
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
{
  a!map(
    datasetName: cons!CMGT_EXT_DATASET_RESIDENTIAL_PERMIT,
    datasetUuid: cons!CMGT_EXT_TXT_GENERATED_CASE_CATEGORY_UUIDS[1],
    caseRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_ResidentialPermit_Case,
    studioFieldsRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_ResidentialPermit_CaseStudioFields,
    referenceTaskRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_ResidentialPermit_ReferenceTasks,
    taskBlockRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_ResidentialPermit_TaskBlocks,
    caseTypeWorkflowRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_ResidentialPermit_WorkflowTasks,
    documentRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_ResidentialPermit_Documents,
    commentRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_ResidentialPermit_Comments,
    taskUpdateRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_ResidentialPermit_Task_StatusUpdate,
    automationRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_ResidentialPermit_AutomationRules,
    emailTemplateRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_ResidentialPermit_EmailTemplates
  ),
  a!map(
    datasetName: cons!CMGT_EXT_DATASET_FRAUDULENT_TRANSACTIONS,
    datasetUuid: cons!CMGT_EXT_TXT_GENERATED_CASE_CATEGORY_UUIDS[2],
    caseRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_FraudulentTransactions_Case,
    studioFieldsRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_FraudulentTransactions_CaseStudioFields,
    referenceTaskRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_FraudulentTransactions_ReferenceTasks,
    taskBlockRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_FraudulentTransactions_TaskBlocks,
    caseTypeWorkFlowRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_FraudulentTransactions_WorkflowTasks,
    documentRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_FraudulentTransactions_Documents,
    commentRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_FraudulentTransactions_Comments,
    taskUpdateRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_FraudulentTransactions_Task_StatusUpdate,
    automationRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_FraudulentTransactions_AutomationRules,
    emailTemplateRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_FraudulentTransactions_EmailTemplates
  )
}

af326a29-a1c8-4399-a28d-996f85819d9e.name: CMGT_UTIL_Filter
af326a29-a1c8-4399-a28d-996f85819d9e.sail_code:
with(
  local!fieldValuePairs: a!defaultValue(
    ri!fieldValuePairs,
    apply(
      rule!CMGT_UTIL_Filter_CreateFieldValuePair(
        field: _,
        value: ri!value,
        allFields: a!flatten(ri!field)
      ),
      a!flatten(ri!field)
    )
  ),
  local!matchingCriteria: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!matchingCriteria,
    default: "ALL"
  ),
  local!matchType: a!defaultValue(value: ri!matchType, default: "EXACT"),
  local!matchIndices: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(a!flatten(ri!records)),
    tointeger({}),
    reduce(
      rule!CMGT_UTIL_Filter_Reducer(
        matchingCriteria: local!matchingCriteria,
        previousIndices: _,
        records: a!flatten(ri!records),
        fieldValuePair: _,
        matchType: local!matchType
      ),
      a!match(
        value: local!matchingCriteria,
        equals: "ALL",
        then: enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1,
        equals: "ANY",
        then: {},
        default: fn!error(
          "Invalid matchingCriteria, must be one of: ALL, ANY"
        )
      ),
      local!fieldValuePairs
    )
  ),
  local!rejectIndices: difference(
    if(
      a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!records),
      tointeger({}),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1
    ),
    local!matchIndices
  ),
  local!matches: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!matchIndices, {})
  ),
  local!rejects: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!rejectIndices, {})
  ),
  local!output: a!match(
    value: a!defaultValue(ri!filterType, "FILTER"),
    equals: "FILTER",
    then: local!matches,
    equals: "REJECT",
    then: local!rejects,
    equals: "FIRST_MATCH",
    then: index(local!matches, 1, null),
    equals: "FIRST_REJECT",
    then: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
    equals: "MATCH_COUNT",
    then: count(local!matchIndices),
    equals: "REJECT_COUNT",
    then: count(local!rejectIndices),
    equals: "MATCH_INDICES",
    then: local!matchIndices,
    equals: "REJECT_INDICES",
    then: local!rejectIndices,
    equals: "FULL_RESULT",
    then: a!map(
      matches: local!matches,
      rejects: local!rejects,
      firstMatch: index(local!matches, 1, null),
      firstReject: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
      matchCount: count(local!matchIndices),
      rejectCount: count(local!rejectIndices),
      matchIndices: local!matchIndices,
      rejectIndices: local!rejectIndices
    ),
    default: fn!error(
      "Invalid filterType, must be one of: FILTER, REJECT, FIRST_MATCH, FIRST_REJECT, MATCH_COUNT, REJECT_COUNT, MATCH_INDICES, REJECT_INDICES, FULL_RESULT"
    )
  ),
  local!output
)

_a-0000ec34-7771-8000-9bb0-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_EXT_UTIL_ReturnDatsetDetailsByDatasetName
_a-0000ec34-7771-8000-9bb0-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
  rule!CMGT_UTIL_Filter(
    records: rule!CMGT_EXT_ENUM_DATASET(),
    field: "datasetUuid",
    value: ri!datasetUuids
  ),
  cast(typeof(a!map()), fv!item)
)

8af695e2-f3e1-4fe7-9755-ff66a47ce843.name: CMGT_UTIL_MergeMaps
8af695e2-f3e1-4fe7-9755-ff66a47ce843.sail_code:
with(
  local!value1_keyed: if(
    isnull(ri!key),
    ri!map1,
    index(ri!map1, ri!key, null)
  ),
  local!value2_keyed: if(
    isnull(ri!key),
    ri!map2,
    index(ri!map2, ri!key, null)
  ),
  local!newValue: if(
    and(
      runtimetypeof(local!value1_keyed) = 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Map',
      runtimetypeof(local!value2_keyed) = 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Map'
    ),
    reduce(
      rule!CMGT_UTIL_MergeMaps(
        previous: _,
        key: _,
        map1: local!value1_keyed,
        map2: local!value2_keyed
      ),
      a!map(),
      union(
        a!keys(local!value1_keyed),
        a!keys(local!value2_keyed)
      )
    ),
    a!defaultValue(local!value2_keyed, local!value1_keyed)
  ),
  if(
    isnull(ri!key),
    local!newValue,
    #"urn:appian:function:v1:a:update"(ri!previous, ri!key, local!newValue)
  )
)
